name: Richard Maru Caringal
description: I'm a full stack developer and a Computer Science senior at the University of Santo Tomas. Let's see more of what I do!
about: I hold a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with a focus on Data Science. My passion lies in the problem-solving aspect of programming, and I specialize in Java and Next.js for web development projects. Eager to stay at the forefront of technology, I am always on the lookout for opportunities to learn and explore new tools and frameworks. Currently, I am actively seeking a full-time position as a software developer.
projects_description: The projects below are personal side projects that I have made as a student. Most of it are apps that I use on a daily basis. Here are some projects I have made for the past three years.
